title: Stephen Kinnock – 2021 Comments on the Apple Daily Newspaper in Hong Kong
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Stephen Kinnock, the Shadow Asia and Pacific Minister, on 17 June 2021.
content:
The raid on Apple Daily and the arrests of journalists is yet another unacceptable attack on Hong Kong’s media freedom, guaranteed under the Basic Law.
